admet_pro.short_description: Calculates absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, and toxicity (or ADMET) of molecules.

ak_scores.short_description: Predicts the exact binding energy between inputted target protein and ligand.

ak_scores2.short_description: Predicts the exact binding energy between inputted target protein and ligand.

alphafold2.short_description: Predicts the complex structures which consisted with multiple proteins.

alphafold2_multistate.short_description: Predicts the structure of target protein.

cells.short_description: Searches genomic properties of various cell lines which are used for drug discovery.

chemical_patents.short_description: Searches the patent which the target compound and its derivative were included in.

chemical_patents_db.short_description: Searches the patents include chemical compounds.

compounds.short_description: Searches already studied/commercially available chemical compounds and registers them to personal library.

deep_comets.short_description: Quantifies the DNA damage in each cell from comet assay image.

dock_millions.short_description: Screens the molecules which have strong binding affinity with target protein among 5 to 50 million of molecule candidates by using molecule modeling simulation and machine learning.

docking.short_description: Measures the binding strength between target protein and molecules by using Autodock-GPU.

dtiplus_affinity.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

dtiplus_hit.short_description: Searches the compounds which can be bound with protein via artificial intelligence.

galaxydock3.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

galaxytbm.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

genes.short_description: Searches the information of genes including kinases genes and GPCR genes.

genomes.short_description: Searches the information of association between genes, transcriptome, and proteins.

molfinder.short_description: Screens the molecules which have desired properties by using MolFinder based on inputted scaffold.

molfinder_de_novo.short_description: Screens the molecules which have desired properties by using MolFinder.

molfinder_pipeline.short_description: Generates the molecules which have strong binding affinity with target protein via Molfinder and Docking.

mutant.short_description: Predicts the structure of mutated protein based on the artificial intelligence.

optimizer.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

protein_contactmaps.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

protein_features.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

protein_msa.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

protein_properties.short_description: Analyzes the structural properties such as disordered region or secondary structure by analyzing the sequence of target protein.

protein_sites.short_description: Predicts the binding site of target protein.

protein_structures.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

proteins_app.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

redesigns.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

retrosynthesis.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.

retrotrae.short_description: Predicts the precursors for synthesis of the target compound.

spica.short_description: Predicts the physicochemical/biological properties of target compound.

targets.short_description: Searches the 3D structure binding possibility of targets for drug discovery and performance of published compounds artificial intelligence models.

templates.short_description: Screens the template of target protein for the prediction of target protein structure.

v_dock.short_description: Note: Don't need to write since it is retired.
